thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Amplifon Q4 Net Profit More Than Doubles To EUR 52.4 Million

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Amplifon Q4 Net Profit More Than Doubles To EUR 52.4 Million
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - AMPLIFON SPA:
* Q4 NET PROFIT EUR 52.4 MILLION VERSUS EUR 24.3 MILLION YEAR AGO
* Q4 EBITDA EUR 75.6 MILLION VERSUS EUR 67.7 MILLION YEAR AGO
* Q4 REVENUE EUR 364.2 MILLION VERSUS EUR 329.2 MILLION YEAR AGO
* PROPOSES DIVIDEND OF EUROCENT 11 PER SHARE * EXPECTS TO CONTINUE STRENGTHENING ITS GLOBAL LEADERSHIP POSITION
* EXPECTS TO RECORD FAVORABLE TREND IN REVENUES AND IN KEY PROFITABILITY INDICATORS Source text for Eikon: (Gdynia Newsroom)
